metadata.description: I made the music with Teenage Engineering OP-1, and made the video with a NVIDIA Omniverse application Audio2Face, which generates face animation depending on input audio. Well, Audio2Face is intended to be used with speech, I used my music instead and tweaked some parameters beyond given parameter limits, to get unusual results.
metadata.tags: audiovisual, audio2face, nvidia, machine learning, op-1, electronic music, omniverse, face animation
